alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:13PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Grant, south central Saline and northeastern Hot Spring Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 213 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Perla, or near Malvern, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malvern... Rockport... Traskwood... Tull... Perla... Magnet Cove... Fenter... Gifford... Glen Rose... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
